job_purpose: Join a federal government department in Perth as an Application Technologist to work with a small team of technical staff in a collaborative and teamwork-oriented environment.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Build Java and Angular applications from provided source
Proficient in code modification and addition
Build and deploy using Bamboo and GitLab CI/CD pipelines
Perform continual maintenance and upkeep of platforms
Address security concerns and identify code vulnerabilities
required_qualifications: Experience building Java and Angular applications
Proficiency in code modification and addition
Experience with Bamboo and GitLab CI/CD pipelines
Ability to address security concerns and identify code vulnerabilities
company_details: Araza is a consultancy known for aligning teams with client needs on innovative projects. They prioritize core values of being great and grateful, fostering diversity and inclusivity, and caring for their employees. Araza has won multiple awards for innovation and growth.
